title: Hour 1: Super Bowl Bound?
description:
Will the Rams get back to the Super Bowl? Dan Orlovsky joins the show to say why Matthew Stafford could lead the Rams to a repeat. Plus Stephen A. breaks down the pressure Josh Allen is under this season, and Dan Orlovsky gives a bold prediction about Lamar Jackson. Later Damien Woody clashes with Stephen A. over who will be missed more Amari Cooper or Rob Gronkowski.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
